mapper.select: select content from tbl_article_content where article_id=#{article_id}
select category_id from tbl_article_category where article_id=#{article_id}
select * from tbl_article_info where id in (select ac.article_id from tbl_category_info as ci,tbl_article_category as ac where ac.category_id=#{id})
mapper.update: update tbl_article_info set title=#{title},summary=#{summary} where id=#{id}

update tbl_article_category as ac set ac.category_id= (select id from tbl_category_info where name='其他分类') where ac.article_id in ( select article_id from (select * from tbl_article_category) as cc where category_id=#{category_id} )
